name: Cosmo-Pétonque
description:
The world is in peril, can you help our hero Timmy defeat the bad guys in a cosmic pétanque (french bowls game) competition?

In Cosmo-Pétonque you will find 2 stages with 4 difficulty modes.

You also can play with your friend in a Local 1v1 mode.

It's a totaly Free Game.

Cosmo-Pétonque is a fun project made by 4 peoples who tried to make a first game just for fun and to learn.

The game include original music sound track, the firsts pixels arts we tried to do (and some others free assets), a litlle bit of story, and all that were put togethers thanks to Godot Engine.
